content.rendered:
Commuter/Residential Students who wish to purchase more Leo Dollars: You can do so by going through the Office of Student Accounts.  Purchases can be made in a variety of ways for your convenience:

  •  Online through your student portal: La Verne Portal
    •  Click on Student Services and Financial Aid
    •  Click on My Student Account Center
    •  Under Available Items, chose the option for your Leo Dollars purchase ($100 increments or $500)
  • Leo Dollars can be purchased in person at the Student Accounts Office located in Woody Hall on the Main Campus using cash, check or credit card (VISA, MasterCard or Discover)

$100 Leo Dollars – Can be purchased in $100 increments up to $500.

$500 Leo Dollars –  Commuter students only.

For more information about dining services: Dining Services/Housing

** Please note: Leo Dollars​ can be used on campus at the Spot or Barbara’s Place.  The dollars function like a debit card ​when your student identification card is scanned and are subtracted at every purchase.  Plans are non-refundable, roll over semester to semester, but do expire after the academic year.
